intents.context: They are popular beliefs that people have with the conviction that they help them prevent a pregnancy, but they are not really effective or scientifically based.

intents.context: They are methods that help prevent pregnancy through elements foreign to the body and are divided into temporary modern methods and definitive modern methods. As their names indicate, temporary methods can be stopped at any time and fertility will return if the woman wishes to become pregnant. The definitive modern methods are surgical procedures that will prevent a man and a woman from having children again for life.

qas.patterns: What are modern methods?

answers.text: They are methods that help prevent pregnancy through elements foreign to the body and are divided into temporary modern methods and definitive modern methods. As their names indicate, temporary methods can be stopped at any time and fertility will return if the woman wishes to become pregnant. The definitive modern methods are surgical procedures that will prevent a man and a woman from having children again for life.

intents.context: No, none of these substances have contraceptive effects to prevent pregnancy, therefore this idea is only part of people's imagination and some popular false beliefs. What really works is the proper use of methods modern contraceptives or abstention.

intents.context: No, as their name indicates, they are emergency contraceptive pills that have several ways of acting: They increase and thicken the mucus or discharge from the cervix or cervix, preventing mobility and the passage of sperm to the uterus They inhibit or accelerate the ovulation process so that fertilization does not occur.

intents.context: No, the use of contraceptives has nothing to do with reproductive disorders or fertility problems, they prevent pregnancy as long as the person uses them correctly, when they are stopped, fertility returns. What happens is that many people use contraceptives without knowing their reproductive possibilities or if they have any alteration; when they stop using the method to get pregnant, they realize that they have difficulties, but not because of the contraceptive, but because they existed previously.

intents.context: From the menarche (first menstruation) the cycles can be irregular for several months, presenting frequent delays, which is given by the immaturity of the body. This can be considered normal. Other causes of delays can be the lack of ovulation, delayed ovulation, stress, climate change, special emotional situations, fear of pregnancy and pregnancy, etc. Most of the causes are easily detectable and treatable.

qas.patterns: Why is my period late?

answers.text: From the menarche (first menstruation) the cycles can be irregular for several months, presenting frequent delays, which is given by the immaturity of the body. This can be considered normal. Other causes of delays can be the lack of ovulation, delayed ovulation, stress, climate change, special emotional situations, fear of pregnancy and pregnancy, etc. Most of the causes are easily detectable and treatable.

intents.context: It is an imaginary pregnancy and can occur in women who intensely want a pregnancy. These women present all the subjective symptoms of pregnancy, associated with a considerable increase in abdominal volume, enlargement of the breasts, appearance of discharge by the nipples and general discomfort. A pregnancy test can confirm the diagnosis and go to treatment to solve this emotional disturbance that leads to developing a psychological pregnancy.

qas.patterns: What is a psychological pregnancy?

answers.text: It is an imaginary pregnancy and can occur in women who intensely want a pregnancy. These women present all the subjective symptoms of pregnancy, associated with a considerable increase in abdominal volume, enlargement of the breasts, appearance of discharge by the nipples and general malaise. Through a pregnancy test, the diagnosis can be confirmed and treatment can be sought to solve this emotional disturbance that leads to the development of a psychological pregnancy.

intents.context: Also called erotic dreams, they are sensations of arousal during sleep. They occur in both men and women. In the case of men, they can cause an ejaculation. intents.context: Semen appears during puberty between approximately 11 and 13 years of age. It is a fluid that contains sperm and is expelled from the penis during ejaculation.

qas.patterns: At what age does semen appear?

answers.text: Semen appears during puberty between approximately 11 and 13 years of age. It is a fluid that contains spermatozoa and is expelled from the penis during ejaculation.

intents.context: The size of the penis in a flaccid relaxed state ranges from three to ten centimeters. The size of the penis in an erect state can be between 12 and 17 centimeters. It is important to note that when the penis is erect it can bend or triple its size, although this depends on the race and the physical structure of the man.

qas.patterns: What is the normal size of the penis?

answers.text: The size of the penis in a flaccid relaxed state ranges from three to four inches. The size of the penis in an erect state can be between 12 and 17 centimeters. It is important to note that when the penis is erect it can bend or triple its size, although this depends on the race and the physical structure of the man.

intents.context: Es el tiempo de duración entre una menstruación y otra,  contando desde el primer día de sangrado menstrual hasta el  primer día de la siguiente menstruación. Por ejemplo, si a una  mujer le llegó la menstruación el día cinco de junio (primer día  de ciclo menstrual) y volvió a menstruar el 30 de junio, puede  decirse que su ciclo fue de 26 días. El ciclo menstrual es  variable de una mujer a otra y tiene días de más alto riesgo de  embarazo.

qas.patterns: ¿Qué es un ciclo menstrual?

answers.text: Es el tiempo de duración entre una menstruación y otra,  contando desde el primer día de sangrado menstrual hasta el  primer día de la siguiente menstruación. Por ejemplo, si a una  mujer le llegó la menstruación el día cinco de junio (primer día  de ciclo menstrual) y volvió a menstruar el 30 de junio, puede  decirse que su ciclo fue de 26 días. El ciclo menstrual es  variable de una mujer a otra y tiene días de más alto riesgo de  embarazo.

intents.context: The anus, vagina, and mouth are mucous membranes, tissues that are very sensitive to infection, disease, and/or injury. If the genitals of the person with whom you are having oral or anal intercourse are infected with some virus or bacteria will pass them on to your partner. The only way to prevent a Sexually Transmitted Infection is with the proper use of condoms in all sexual relations, be it vaginal, oral or anal.

qas.patterns: Why can you also get a Sexually Transmitted Infection (STI) through anal and oral sex?

If the genitals of the person with whom you are having oral or anal intercourse are infected with some virus or bacteria will pass them on to your partner. The only way to prevent a Sexually Transmitted Infection is with the proper use of condoms in all sexual relations, be it vaginal, oral or anal.

intents.context: Yes, that is a personal and couple's decision. If the person decides to practice them, it is advisable to always use a condom to prevent Sexually Transmitted Infections (STIs) including HIV/AIDS.
